examples: He growled with barely controlled fury.
He was beside himself with fury. I had never felt such fury before.
He vented his fury on a telephone box.
That kind of treatment would drive anyone to fury. The decision to close the factory has provoked fury.
His face and body sagged as the fury drained from him.
She turned on him in a fury.
He kicked the tree in fury at his own stupidity.
I hoped she wouldn't turn her fury on me.
